query: Q1. Which form view mode allows you to preview live data while you work on the design of the form?
options:
**Preview** view
 **Layout** view
 **Design** view
 **Form** view

query: Q3. What is the Access string operator that joins or concatenates text strings together?
options:
&
 !
 #
 -

[\_Caveat:](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/string-functions-and-how-to-use-them-965efa84-7009-4603-9765-2eb4a099ec72) - "In a desktop database, you can also use the ampersand operator (&) for concatentation. In an Access app, you must use the plus sign (+)."\_

query: Q4. The relationship field in this table has been created with what feature?
options:
lookup
 reference integrity
 pick list
 validation rule

query: Q5. On a report, you want to display a header for each change in month name. How should you set up the Group and Sort options so that they are in the proper chronological order?
options:
Sort on month number, then sort on month name
 Sort on month number, then group on month name
 Group on month number, then sort by month name
 Group on month number, then sort on month number

query: Q6. What kind of query will display data with both column headers and row headers?
options:
crosstab
 select
 simple
 spreadsheet

query: Q7. What currency format displays a thousand separator, but not a currency symbol, such as $ or â‚¬?
options:
Scientific
 Standard
 General Number
 Fixed

query: Q8. In Access Option > Current Database, what does turning off the Allow Full Menus option do?
options:
removes the ribbon interface
 removes all ribbon tabs except Home and Print Preview
 disable the right-click menu when working with objects
 removes the **Design** view contextual tabs, which forces most design changes to be made in **Layout** view

query: Q10. You want a form to appear automatically, whenever the database starts. How do you do this?
options:
In the **Access Options** dialog box, click **Current Database**, then select the form you want to open in the **Display Form** property
 Open the form you want to display automatically in **Design** view. Then in the property sheet, set **Open on Launch** to **true**
 Right-click the form you want to open automatically and select **Startup Form**
 On the **Database Tools** tab, click **Database Options**, then set the form you want to open as the **Initial View** object

query: Q11. In Design view, which area of a form is the primary location for text boxes, buttons, and other control objects?
options:
**Page Layout**
 **View** section
 Form body
 **Detail** section

query: Q12. What tool builds a report containing detailed information about the object in the database?
options:
Object dependencies
 Table analyzer
 Access database manager
 Database documenter

query: Q13. You want to validate a proposed modification to a record's value before the table is saved to the database. What data macro can you add to the table to do this?
options:
After Insert
 Before Change
 After Update
 Before Delete

query: Q14. When you add a group to a report, what automatically gets added to the structure?
options:
a group header
 nothing
 a group header and footer
 a group footer

query: Q15. A table contains a field with the lookup properties set as shown. What will be the value of the field when the end user clicks Normal from the combo box when entering a record into the table?
options:
1
 3
 2
 Normal

query: Q16. What program flow function evaluates a condition and either returns a truepart or a falsepart?
options:
`Switch()`
 `IsError()`
 `IIf()`
 `Choose()`

https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/iif-function-32436ecf-c629-48a3-9900-647539c764e3

query: Q17. The display for numerical data defaults to a **\_alignment, and text data defaults to **\_aligntment
options:
left; right
 right; left
 left; left
 right; right

[Text:](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/format-a-text-field-a5e5bcde-85da-4c7a-8164-1fe286636668)
[Numerical:](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/format-a-number-or-currency-field-e48f2312-67f0-4921-aca0-15d36b7f9c3b)

query: Q18. Which data type is a modern replacement for the OLE Object data type?
options:
Attachment
 Replication ID
 BLOB
 Hyperlink

query: Q19. How can you ensure that each value saved in a particular field is unique from all other values in the field?
options:
Set the Indexed property to No
 Set the Required property to Yes (Unique Values)
 Set the Validation Rule property to No Duplicates
 Set the Indexed property to Yes (No Duplicates)

query: Q20. Which Access database tool will help you split a single, large, unnormalized data table into multiple related tables that follow the best practices of good database design?
options:
Database Documenter
 Compact and Repair Database
 Database Splitter Wizard
 Table Analyzer Wizard

query: Q21. When backing up an Access database, what is added to the file name automatically?
options:
`A serialized backup number, such as "_Backup_2"`
 `The current date, such as "_2019-08-21"`
 `The characters "_bu"`
 `The word "_Archive"`

query: Q22. Which table field property, if supplied, will display instead of the field name as a column header when viewing the datasheet of as a label when the field is added toa form or report?
options:
Popup Text
 Description
 Caption
 Tool Tip

query: Q23. Which form control property creates a small pop-up flag that contains text when a user hovers the mouse cursor over the object?
options:
ControlTip Text
 Status Text
 Tool Text
 Help Text

query: Q24. The expression values <=, <>, and > are found in what expression category?
options:
comparison operators
 logical operators
 string operators
 arithmetic operators

query: Q25. Which section of a report appears at the top of every page in the printed report?
options:
page header
 group header
 detail header
 report header

query: Q26. When would you use a left join query?
options:
When you want to retrieve every record from the left table, plus any matching information from the right table where it exists
 When you want to retrieve all of the records from the right table that have matching records in the left table
 When you want to retrieve just the records from the left table that have matching records in the right table
 When you want to retrieve just the records from the left table that do not have any matching records in the right table

query: Q27. How can you run a submacro saved in a macro?
options:
Use an If container in the macro.
 Call the submacro with the [MacroName]![SubMacroName] syntax.
 Use a RunMacro or OnError macro action.
 Expand the macro in the **Navigation Pane** and double-click the submacro name.

query: Q28. Which combo box property defines what values appear when the user clicks the drop-down arrow?
options:
Control Source
 Row Source
 Value List
 Data Source

query: Q29. What does the expression Now() evaluate to?
options:
the current system date
 the current system date, time, and time zone
 the current system date and time
 the current system time

query: Q30. Certain words have special meaning to Access, and you should avoid using them as table or field names. What are these words called?
options:
discouraged terms
 reserved words
 retired objects
 system names
